channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: On a sleepover at the Sheep's house, Peppa and Suzy sit up in bed talking about what they will do when they are grown up.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Five episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Doctor Hamster comes to school to talk about butterflies.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grampy Rabbit's new jet pack shoots off into the distance and he ends up on top of a snowy mountain.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When Daddy's car goes missing it's up to Detective Potato to find it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's family squeeze into the new car that Daddy Pig is trying out for fun.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle wants fish for dinner, so he goes out fishing with Mr Elf, Ben and Holly on Mr Elf's boat. Mr Elf tells them a story about the biggest, baddest fish ever - Big Bad Barry.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle does not want to get any older so decides that no one must celebrate his birthday. But all of the Little Kingdom has been waiting to celebrate.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig and Grandpa Dog are showing and sharing their lovely, tomato filled, Greenhouses to Peppa and George.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George sailing, but they keep getting stuck in the mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle has got another task for the children; making masks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is Molly Mole's first day at school and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Ratoncito Perez fix his wand in 'Ratoncito Perez', then in 'The Berry Hungry Caterpillar', Dora helps Carlos the Caterpillar become a butterfly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps a Unicornasaurus get a magic paintbrush back in 'Unicornasaurus', then in 'The Grumple Games', Dora helps Hearty win the Grumple Games.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora is shrunk by Big Red Chicken's magic in 'Little Dora's Big Adventure', then in 'Bye Bye Balloon', Dora and Boots help get Benny's Balloon under control.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Benny embrace his singing skills in 'Singin' in the Tub', then in 'Show and Share', Dora helps Boots find something for Show and Share.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Four episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit gives Peppa and friends a tennis lesson, but the tennis balls get everywhere! So, the children play badminton instead and it's a lot easier.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family are on a caravan adventure and the first stop is The Biggest Potato in the World. When it starts to get foggy, they park up before another busy day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: After Peppa and family visit a tourist spot with her new friend Birgit Bear, the caravan unhooks from the car! Luckily, the bear family stop it just in time.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an island full of rubbish by Mayor Humdinger.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: It's Halloween in Adventure Bay, and a mysterious kid in a giant spider costume is taking all the treats from the Trick-Or-Treaters.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A special spooky play is planned in 'Paddington and the Cursed Halloween Show', then in 'Paddington saves the Mooncake Festival', Taylor the lifeguard arrives in Windsor Gardens.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Taylor reveals its his birthday, but how can his friends make it special when they had no idea? It's Burn's Night and Mrs Bird teaches Paddington about a rare creature called a Wild Haggis.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger's kitties make off with Mayor Goodway's book delivery truck in 'Pups Save the Big Book Delivery', then in 'Pups Save the Puppets', Julius and Julia get into a sticky situation.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Mr. Crocodile
channel.desc: Daisy and Mr. Crocodile search for a lucky item to help them win a bike raffle in 'Lucky Croc', then in 'Sleepover Croc', Mr. Crocodile can't fall asleep at his first sleepover.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots help Dulce the Dragon in 'Learning To Fly', and in 'Queen Swiper', La Reina and Swiper's bodies are switched by Big Red Chicken's magic. Dora and Boots help them switch back.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig are taking Peppa and George to a festival - a jigsaw festival! Peppa is amazed by all of the completed jigsaws around the festival.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle is making a wicker basket. She explains it is a hobby - something you do to relax. The children discuss hobbies and learn about each other's favourite things to do.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig and Peppa are at Granny Pig's house. They find Mummy's old patchwork quilt that Granny made for her as a baby. Peppa decides she'd like to make one for the baby.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is out with Suzy and Granny Sheep. They come across an old van that Miss Rabbit is recycling. Granny Sheep decides she would like to turn it into an art van.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: When the Adventure Bay potluck food goes missing, the Safety and Rescue pups deputize the whole community to track it down.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: With so many bikes on the road, Chase is on the case with his team of Safety and Rescue Pups - a crew dedicated to keeping Adventure Bay as safe as possible.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Boomer challenges Roxi to a race in 'Pups Save the Risky Race', then in 'Pups Save the Runaway Truck', Boomer is left dangling from a drawbridge as his monster truck goes without a driver.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Danny X straps on a rocket booster in 'Pups Stop A Rocket-Powered Pogo Stick', then in 'Pups Save the Sky-High Stunt Show', Francois' stunt goes horribly awry.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi get stuck in the Haunted Maze in 'Pups Save a Haunted Farm', then in 'Pups Save the Adventure Bay Boogie', Sid steals a pumpkin Disco Ball.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: The bunnies discover a haunted house in 'Ghosts!', and then in 'The Gobbler!', the team goes undercover at a Gala.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The children must walk to school in a walking bus! Miss Rabbit wears a high visibility jacket, leading Peppa and friends in a bus formation.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: While Mummy and Daddy Pig attend a refresher antenatal class, Peppa and George join Miss Rabbit's Sibling School, and learn about what to expect when the baby arrives.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When Daddy Pig gets a parking ticket, Peppa and George learn that grown-ups have rules just like children - and get told off too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig teaches Peppa how to wink. Zoe has come to visit with her toy monkey, so Peppa teaches her what she's learnt.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia take on their parents at Tailball.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy & Tia find a lost toy and vow to return it to its owner.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Kai is super excited to ride the Nebulator, but Tim isn't so sure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: It's Smurfies versus Gargamel in 'See Gargamel Run', then in 'Hefty Baby', Baby Smurf gets stronger.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: When the Duke of Flappington steals a levitation gem from the castle and uses it to raise Barkingburg into the clouds, Skye must beat her biggest fears to lead the team in their biggest rescue yet.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The Crew helps Charger fall asleep in 'The Crew Builds Charger a Super Bed', then in 'The Crew Builds a Super Squirrely Whirly Playground', the pups play like Super Squirrely Whirly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: It's Halloween, and when Blaze and his little sister Sparkle hear about a magical Trick or Treat Treasure they set out on a spook-tacular treasure hunt to find it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is so excited to meet her new baby brother or sister, but they are taking forever to arrive until suddenly Mummy Pig announces the baby is coming, now.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and family go on a walk through the forests where they meet all their favourite fairytale characters.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Pedro gets a cough at playschool and the other children quickly catch it. Doctor Brownbear is called and gives them horrible medicine, but who will look after him when he is ill.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is given the very important task of suggesting names for the new baby. She thinks of all sorts of names, but they aren't quite right.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza & Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story to help them fall asleep. When George wakes up again Peppa has to make up a bedtime story to get him back to sleep.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The nurse visits, and she decides that today's visit should be all about how to hold a baby. The nurse shows Peppa a special way for a small person to safely hold a baby.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George enjoy helping Grandpa Pig plant seeds in his garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Rubble's cousin visits Adventure Bay in 'Charger Visits the Pups', and then in 'Pups Save a Shiny Ride', Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a contest.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets baby crocs to sleep in 'Croc-A-Bye Baby', The Troll appears in 'Wanna Empanada?', Boots tries new boots in 'if The Boot Fits', and the twins have problems with a 'Pinata Party'.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Mr. Crocodile
channel.desc: Daisy's game is missing in 'Borrower Daisy', then in 'Can Do Croc', a perfect Step-Mother's day for Maggie all depends on Daisy and Mr. Crocodile finding a can opener.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Goodway tries to help rescue Danny in 'Pups Rescue a Rescuer', then in 'Pups Save the Phantom of the Frog Pond', a spooky sound forces the frogs from their home.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Join Tim Rex, his big brother Tommy, little sister Tia, and Triceratops bestie Kai as they tackle kid-shaped problems with dino-sized solutions. in space.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups' wildlife adventure hops away in 'The Crew Builds A Kangaroo Safari', then in 'The Crew Plays In The Construction Games', Speed Meister challenges Rubble & Crew.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: A spilled milkshake causes a sticky situation in 'Dust Bunnies!', then in 'Mrs. Fuzzleglove!', a surprise visit from his mother forces Fuzzleglove to stoop to a new low - being a good guy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Mr. Crocodile
channel.desc: Daisy and Mr. Crocodile search for a lucky item to help them win a bike raffle in 'Lucky Croc', then in 'Sleepover Croc', Mr. Crocodile can't fall asleep at his first sleepover.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly is going on a camping trip with Ben and his mum and dad, but they are soon joined by annoying Mr Gnome, who is always hungry and sings silly songs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Snooty King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to King and Queen Thistle's castle to sample Nanny Plum's cooking. Nanny tries hard to cook special modern food.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Kai and Tommy try to get their ball back from Mum's bedroom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia take on their parents at Tailball.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim tries to bend all the rules when Terri comes to babysit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the Troll untwist his tongue in 'Tongue Twisted Troll', then in 'Chompy and the Cloud Flower', Chompy chomped a rare seed and Dora finds a new one.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington and the Unlikely Hero', then in 'Paddington Needs a Hero', Paddington gets stuck in an igloo.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Dollhouse Delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig has created a watering system, but he does not remember which button is which so Peppa and George help using walkie talkies. The Police hear their signal and are surprised.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George visit Granny and Grandpa's while Granny hosts a historical re-enactment of the 1960s with her friends.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: During another visit to Granny and Grandpa Pig's house, Grandpa takes everyone to show them the new Bug Hotel he is building.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends head to the trampoline park where Miss Rabbit shows them how to bounce. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig and Mummy Sheep decide they want to have a go at trampolining.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, Peppa and George go to the Skate Park with their bicycles, scooters and skateboards. Peppa has fun playing around on Daddy's skateboard.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Today is a special day because Mummy and Daddy Pig have big news to tell Peppa and George. However, Peppa and George struggle to wait patiently, so resort to playing games.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Five episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The children learn about the weather. There is a new friend for Peppa, and Grandpa Pig is making a rock garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The playgroup is visiting the zoo today. Mr Lion then shows them a giant lizard! The children all believe it's a dinosaur.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: While visiting Suzy and Emily's house, Peppa is surprised there are extra rules she doesn't have in her own house like no shoes indoors and no eating peanuts.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends are introduced to some simple woodcraft in the woods with Mr Wolf.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly is going on a camping trip with Ben and his mum and dad in 'Camping Out', and then in 'Dinner Party', King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to sample Nanny Plum's cooking.[(96057)]
